info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 7:02PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Wasatch and northwestern Utah Counties through 745 PM MDT... At 702 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Vineyard, or 11 miles west of Provo, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Provo, Orem, Lehi, Pleasant Grove, American Fork, Eagle Mountain, Lindon, Alpine, Vineyard, Brigham Young University, Wasatch Mountain State Park, Utah Lake, Camp Williams, Saratoga Springs, Highland, Cedar Hills, Deer Creek State Park, Mt Timpanogos and Sundance. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 266 and 283. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
